/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a serene street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a vibrant backdrop to the urban landscape. In the distance, tall buildings rise, their silhouettes forming a contrasting skyline against the sky. The street itself is lined with lush green trees, adding a touch of nature to the cityscape. A bridge arches over the street, connecting different parts of the city. People can be seen walking on the sidewalk, going about their day, adding a dynamic element to the otherwise static scene. The image is bathed in natural light, highlighting the colors and details of the cityscape.
